participant_1.background:
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
my name is john and i live in dallas , tx.
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.
i don t know if i enjoy programming , or if it s my only choice.
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
i have long flowing hair.

content.text: Hi, I'm John. I live in Dallas, Texas.
Hi John, I'm participant_2, I'm from (hometown).
Nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy helping my mom out when she needs me, and I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
That's cool, I like to take my dog for walks every day to stay active. And I enjoy snuggling up with my cat and reading Anne of Green Gables.
It's hard to pick just one, but I love all of the Anne of Green Gables books. They're so heartwarming and comforting.
I've never read them, but I've heard good things. I'll have to check them out.
What do you do for work?
Oh cool, me too! Do you like programming?
I enjoy it for the most part, but it can be challenging sometimes.
I know what you mean. I'm not sure if I love it or if it's just my only choice right now.
Well, if you're good at it, it can be a very rewarding career.
